title: A Tale of Two Hearts
description: Summer in Morro Bay can be boring. Especially when you're thirteen. But things change when Grant and his friends unearth an ancient chest that's been buried for 300 years.The ancient spellbook lures them into trying their hands at magic, and their efforts end with a terrible result. The spellbook has an incantation that will allow them to fix their mistake if they can figure out how to do it. But the window of opportunity closes when the moon rises the following night.The adventure leads them deep inside Morro Rock. Where something is waiting for them. Something beyond their wildest dreams.
author: Cornell DeVille
